text:
encryption/decryption lambda env variables:

1 - Create a enc/dec key with AWS KMS:
 IAM -> Encryption Keys -> select region -> Create Key
 put alias and description -> (opt) add tag -> Select key admins -> select key users -> finish

2 - Set the new key as the one to enc/dec env variables of your lambda
 Lambda -> your lambda -> scroll to environment variables -> encryption configuration -> check Enable helpers for encryption in transit option -> set the new key for both the select options -> Enter value (both) -> Save (never saved because in prod)
title: how to create and set aws lambda enc/dec key
